title: Portable Chargers RAVPower Luster Mini 3350mAh External Battery Pack Battery Bank External Phone Charger Power Pack Most Compact Power Bank with iSmart Technology for Smartphones and More (Black)
feature: Small But Powerful Enough: Sleek mini size fits easily into any pocket or bag, but powerful enough to get a full charge of your iPhone 7 or other smartphones (14 hours of additional talk time or 90 hrs of music playback from your cell phone).

Thoughtful And Ergonomic Design: White plastic cap at the top and unique clip-inspired design would prevent the charger from scratching and rolling off your desk; same anodic oxidation technology as Apple matched with a gorgeous metal shell will transform you into a style icon; Easy to press the power button, 3 status LEDs keep you informed of remaining capacity.

Exclusive iSmart Technology: 1A output and 1A input, charge faster and smarter than others, automatically detects and delivers the optimal charging current for any connected device- ensuring the fastest and most efficient charge.

Safety Protection: Short-circuit and over-current protection will make the charger automatically shut it down if a short circuit or overload output occurred while the unit is charging; Ultra reliable A (plus) Lithium-Ion battery with over 500 battery charge cycles.
What You Get: RAVPower 3rd Gen Luster Mini 3350mAh Portable Charger, Micro USB cable, welcome guide, our fan-favorite 18-month quality guarantee and friendly customer service.
description: For those looking to make a fashion statement, the RAVPower Luster Mini 3350mAh Portable charger External Battery Charger comes in 4 bold colors: Gold, Black, Blue and Pink. Whether you are after a classy look or something trendy and fun, the Luster comes in a color for you. With a minimalistic design weighing in at only 2.6 oz and providing up to 1 extra charge for most smartphones, the Luster Battery Pack is essential for keeping your devices powered throughout the day. Cased in a fresh anodized finish with aluminum alloy from the same manufacturing standard as Apple's products; plastic on both ends and a unique clip-inspired design prevents the charging from scratching or from rolling off your desk; 3 LED's keep you informed of battery status. iSmart 2.0 technology automatically detects and delivers the optimal charging current for any connected device - ensuring the fastest, most efficient charge. iSmart technology ensure the RAVPower Luster Mini Charger is compatible with most smartphone models: iPhone, Galaxy, Note, Nexus, Droid, LG, HTC, Lumia, and other devices. Capacity: 3350mAh Input: DC 5V / 1A Output: DC 5V / 1A Size: 4.02 x 0.91 x 0.91 in Weight: 2.6 oz 1.Please use the original 8Pin/30Pin Cable (Not Included) by Apple to charge Apple products. 2. Due to nature of portable battery chargers, it is suggested you'd better not use this unit to charge a tablet in case the unit gets overheated. - 1 x RAVPower 3350mAh Power Bank (Model: RP-PB33) - 1 x USB to Micro USB cable - 1 x User Guide
